replies.body: Buff your English please... that was aids to read

As long as Yasuo, Yi, Trynd, Draven and a couple of others exist. 
Ninja Tabi will never be as powerful as it should be!

Its a shame for all the other AD champions who miss out on damage, but if you're going to give a select few champs insane auto damage. There needs to be an item that helps deal with that. And so unfortunately the rest of the AD champs suffer because of a few tall poppies.

If we want Ninja Tabi to be nerfed, we need to get rid of the perma-crit tumors that half our HP with a single auto.

But nerf it before that happens, and you leave us defenceless against the tide.

That'd be my view on it.
then just get rid of yasuo's double crit and nerf tabi's

yasuo is easy to keep behind and easy to stop getting ahead, yasuo only ** EVER** becomes a pain to deal with when you screw up hard and feed him, letting him get ahead. And he has double crit, because crit is his sustained damage, doesn't do very much without it.

There is no issue with tabi, it is a niche item that only works well against heavily ad/auto attack based team comps. If you really think about it tabi only blocks ~6% damage which is nothing at all, as most champions get 100 base armour anyway, which is a 50% reduction, and 12% of 50% is only 6%. Lets pretend someone with 400 ad gets a crit on you; it is not even 25 damage, and 25 damage out of 400 ad crit is literally nothing. Tabi is by no means broken, it is just a niche to help people survive in laning phase.

What you're saying is a load of crap. There is a reason that Tabi hasn't been nerfed yet and that's cause, amazingly it's not a broken item.
